results.name: Explore Gasson Hall
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the center of the first floor of Gasson Hall.
results.desc: Visit one of BC's most iconic buildings and take in its Gothic architecture.

results.name: Attend a Football Game
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the entraces of the Alumni Stadium.
results.desc: Attend a BC Eagles football game and soak in the school spirit.

results.name: Dine at Newton Campus Stuart Cafeteria
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque next to the cashier at the Stuart Cafeteria.
results.desc: Try the best steak at BC and enjoy a relaxed meal with friends.

results.name: Relax at the Stokes Quad
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at one of the benches in front of Stokes Hall.
results.desc: A great spot to study or hang out on sunny days.

results.name: Visit the McMullen Museum of Art
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the entrance of McMullen Museum of Art
results.desc: Enjoy the fascinating exhibits located on Brighton Campus.

results.name: Walk the BC Reservoir
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the water facility building along the Reservoir trails.
results.desc: A scenic trail for running, walking, or just enjoying the view.

results.name: Attend a Student Club Fair
results.inst: Attend the student club fair and scan the BC plaque at the Office of Student Services table.
results.desc: Discover new interests and meet like-minded peers.

results.name: Study at the Bapst Library
results.inst: Visit the Bapst Library and scan the BC plaque next to the librarian's desk.
results.desc: Find one of the hidden libraries and make the most out of the quiet atmosphere.

results.name: Work out at the Margot Connell Recreational Center
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque next to the entrance turnstile.
results.desc: Exercise at one of the newest facilities at Boston College.

results.name: Visit the Academic Advising Center
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located by the main desk in the Academic Advising Center.
results.desc: It's never too early to start planning out your four years.

results.name: Buy or Pick-up Event Tickets at Robsham Theatre
results.inst: Ask for a scan when buying or picking-up a ticket at the Robsham Theatre.
results.desc: Attend the events that are exclusively for Boston College students.

results.name: Visit the Richdale Food Shops
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located by the entrance.
results.desc: Visit the closest store to the campus, you will need the Subway.

results.name: Get an ice cream cake at the White Mountain Creamery
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located by the entrance.
results.desc: Celebrate your friends/roommates birthday with a customized ice cream cake.

results.name: Grab a coffee at the Chocolate Bar
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located by the cashier.
results.desc: Visit the Chocolate Bar, one of the most popular cafes on campus.

results.name: Buy a BC apparel at the BC Bookstore
results.inst: Ask for a scan when buying a BC apparel at the BC Bookstore
results.desc: Embody the BC spirit by purchasing a BC apparel.

results.name: Visit Fenway Park
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the Fenway Park tour entrance.
results.desc: Tour the home of the Boston Red Sox and learn its rich history.

results.name: Explore the Museum of Fine Arts
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the main entrance of the Museum of Fine Arts.
results.desc: Discover art and history at one of the country's premier art museums.

results.name: Walk the Freedom Trail
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the Boston Common starting point.
results.desc: Learn about the nation's history by walking the famous trail.

results.name: Visit the Boston Public Library
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the front steps of the library.
results.desc: Enjoy the historic architecture and quiet study spaces.

results.name: Explore the New England Aquarium
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque near the aquarium entrance.
results.desc: Learn about marine life and conservation efforts.

results.name: Visit the Shops on Newbury Street
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque located at the Ben & Jerry's store located at Newbury Street.
results.desc: Explore the unique boutiques, cafes, and shops along Boston's iconic shopping street.

results.name: Visit the Shops in Prudential Center
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the main entrance of the Prudential Center.
results.desc: Explore the variety of shops and dining options in the Prudential Center.

results.name: Explore Quincy Market
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the entrance of Faneuil Hall.
results.desc: Enjoy shopping and dining in one of Boston's busiest marketplaces.

results.name: Visit the Boston Public Garden
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque near the George Washington statue at the entrance.
results.desc: Stroll through the beautiful gardens and enjoy the serene atmosphere in the heart of the city.

results.name: Tour the USS Constitution Museum
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the museum entrance.
results.desc: Learn about the history of the USS Constitution, 'Old Ironsides'.

results.name: Explore the Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the museum's entrance.
results.desc: Revisit the revolutionary history of the Boston Tea Party.

results.name: Walk through the Rose Kennedy Greenway
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the Carousel.
results.desc: Enjoy art installations and green spaces along the Greenway.

results.name: Visit the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the museum entrance.
results.desc: Marvel at the art collections and Venetian-style architecture.

results.name: Climb the Bunker Hill Monument
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque at the base of the monument.
results.desc: Learn about the Battle of Bunker Hill and take in great views.

results.name: Watch a Movie at the Coolidge Corner Theatre
results.inst: Scan the BC plaque near the ticket counter.
results.desc: Relax and watch the latest blockbuster with friends.
